Synopsis:
---------
Adam (Jim Sturgess) is a seemingly ordinary guy in an extraordinary world.He lives humbly than it earns, but his romantic spirit retains in memory the impossible love for Eden ( Kirsten Dunst ) , a girl he met in a different world, in a place that is out of reach.However, when he returns to see her on TV, there is nothing in the world that prevents you from finding your way to take you to her.
